articles.title: Shaun White ends Olympic career with fourth place finish in halfpipe - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: American Shaun White will be leaving his final Olympic Games without a medal. The veteran snowboarder finished fourth in men's halfpipe, missing the podium by 2.25 points in his fifth Olympic Games.
articles.content:
